name: draining-kiss
effect: Deals regular damage. Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user steals the target’s HP with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user steals the target’s HP with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user steals the target’s HP with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.
